text:
League 1
PSG: Ultras claim their freedom in front of the Parc des Princes
PSG face the grumbling ultras. They demonstrated this morning in front of the Parc des Princes to claim their freedom in the stands.
04 Nov 2019, 14:20 by Mourad Bennis



PSG and ultras are currently at a dead end. Annoyed by the treatment reserved for them, the ultras decided to fight back by conducting a demonstration in front of Parc des Princes this morning.




The situation does not settle between the PSG and the ultras




Ultras from PSG + 9 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

The battle is raging between the Paris management and PSG ultras. The latter reproach the Parisian leaders for wanting to exclude important members within the ultras movement.
The stadium bans of which some ultras are victimized to annoy the main associations of PSG ultras. That's why, this morning, three associations (Block Parisii, Paname Rebirth, Collectif Utras Paris) demonstrated in front of the Parc des Princes to demand another mode of operation on the part of the Parisian management. With the bonus of a huge banner: "Freedom for our stands: Banners Passion Songs Ultras Pyro Pleasure Respect".
As a reminder, the Collectif Ultras Paris announced a boycott until further notice last week despite a satisfactory meeting with the leaders of the club.
